mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.* , rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT p.pid, p.pname, p.activated, s.sname, t.tname FROM F_PROGRAM p INNER JOIN F_SPORTS s ON s.sid = p.sid INNER JOIN F_TEACHER t ON t.tid = p.tid ORDER BY p.activated DESC, p.pid DESC) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO F_PROGRAM (pid, pname, pinfo, sid, tid, price, preparationCost, preparation) VALUES (SEQ_PROGRAM_PID.nextval, #{pname}, #{pinfo}, #{sid}, #{tid}, #{price}, #{preparationCost}, #{preparation})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, (SELECT sname FROM F_SPORTS s WHERE s.sid=p.sid) AS sname, (SELECT tname FROM F_TEACHER t WHERE t.tid=p.tid) AS tname FROM F_PROGRAM p WHERE pid=#{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE F_PROGRAM SET pname = #{pname}, pinfo = #{pinfo}, activated = #{activated}, sid = #{sid}, tid = #{tid}, price = #{price}, preparationCost = #{preparationCost}, preparation = #{preparation} WHERE pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM F_PROGRAM WHERE activated='Y' ORDER BY sid
SELECT p.*, t.tname FROM F_PROGRAM p INNER JOIN F_TEACHER t ON p.tid = t.tid WHERE p.activated='Y' AND p.sid = #{sid} ORDER BY p.pname
SELECT * FROM F_PROGRAM p, F_SPORTS s, F_TEACHER t WHERE p.sid = s.sid AND p.tid = t.tid ORDER BY p.pid
